#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#define in(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define out(a) printf("%d\n",a)
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n,k,x,y,i;
	
	
	while(t--)
	{
	  int  arr[100004]={ };
	  int  ans[100004]={ };
	  
	  in(n);  in(k);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			in(x);  in(y);
			
			arr[x]++;    arr[y+1]--;
		}
		
		for(i=1;i<=100004;i++)
			ans[i]=ans[i-1]+arr[i];
		
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
			in(x);
			out(ans[x]);
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
